hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Light Arrows#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Fishing Pond#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Hookshot#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Big Lava Room Blocked Door Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: That's a nice wall you got there. Would be a shame if I just... clipped right through that.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #gold#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Magic Meter#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Lizalfos Maze Upper Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Light Arrows#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Three things are certain: death, taxes, and forgetting a check.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #an Odd Mushroom# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #0# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the easiest way to kill Peahats is using Din's Fire while they're grounded.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Map of Dodongo's Cavern# and #Epona's Song#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #1# major item.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Lobby Left Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Song of Time#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Falling Spikes Upper Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Purple Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Magic Meter#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a chest and a crate in locked basements# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple MQ Boss Key Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Beamos Room Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.
